subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Leodis McKelvin scored on a 79-yard punt return and the Buffalo Bills’ oft-maligned defense finally flexed its muscles in a 19-14 victory over the Miami Dolphins.
snippet: Leodis McKelvin scored on a 79-yard punt return and the Buffalo Bills’ oft-maligned defense finally flexed its muscles in a 19-14 victory over the Miami Dolphins.
